Ruth Ruby

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Gustave or C. H. Wulf
  3. Foster Family Alt: Wulff
  4. Location of Family: Blair, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Blair, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 8
  8. Date of Birth: 1894-05-08, Rochester, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1990-06-19, Blair, NE
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Ruth Gaydon
  12. Spouse Name: Charles Gaydon
  13. Source: OTR, 637; Archives Database; Blair Courier, 12 March 1903.
